Pre-Game Insights: Burkina Faso come into Sunday's game after a 1-1 draw away to Senegal in their opening game of AFCON qualifying.
Ousseni Bouda shocked the Senegalese with a last-gasp equaliser, as the forward cancelled out Sadio Mane's early opener and handed Burkina Faso a strong start to their qualification hopes.
Burkina Faso sit in third and are five points behind table-toppers Egypt, but they are crucially only one point behind Guinea-Bissau who occupy second.
Malawi will be looking to bounce back after a disappointing 3-2 home defeat at the hands of Burundi on Thursday.
Malawi have now only won one of their last six games in all competitions, with that win being a 3-1 victory over Sao Tome and Principe back in June.
Malawi are fourth after four games in their World Cup qualification group.
